title: YouTube starts testing timed emoji reactions on some channels
content:
YouTube has started testing a new feature that will let you share reactions at an exact moment in a video. It follows the timed comments feature that YouTube started testing in April last year, shortly after it first removed the dislike countÂ on some videos. The feature is currently available on a small number of channels

The post YouTube starts testing timed emoji reactions on some channels appeared first on xda-developers.
description: YouTube's latest experiment lets you shared timed emoji reactions on videos from a few channels. Read on to learn more.
